snippet: With a minimal staff and rented equipment, the public station in New Jersey has broadcast up to three live newscasts, with many news breaks a day to keep up with the hurricane.
abstract: New Jersey public station NJTV, with minimal staff and rented equipment, has broadcast up to three live newscasts, with many news breaks daily to keep up with Hurricane Sandy and its aftermath.
lead_paragraph: With a minimal staff and rented equipment, the public station in New Jersey has broadcast up to three live newscasts, with many news breaks a day to keep up with the hurricane.

headline.seo: Storm Poses First Big Test for NJTV
headline.main: Storm Poses First Major Test for NJTV News Coverage
headline.print_headline: Storm Poses First Major Test for NJTV News Coverage
